references.paper_title: Recovering non-rigid 3d shape from image streams
references.reason: This paper introduces a fundamental method for non-rigid structure from motion, which is directly relevant to the core problem addressed in TRACKSTO4D.

references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the geometric deep learning approach used in TRACKSTO4D, introducing a way to directly handle point cloud data which is central to the network design.

references.paper_title: On learning sets of symmetric elements
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for designing equivariant layers in neural networks, which is essential to the architecture of TRACKSTO4D for handling the inherent symmetries in point tracks.
This paper directly addresses the problem of reconstructing consistent video depth, which is highly relevant to the approach of TRACKSTO4D, and provides a direct comparison point for results.

references.paper_title: Structure and motion from casual videos
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it also focuses on reconstructing 3D structures from casual videos and is directly compared with TRACKSTO4D in terms of accuracy and inference time.
